title: Ionic Developer
jobDescription:
Design and development of hybrid mobile applications (iOS and Android) using IONIC/React Native Framework

Good understanding of Angular and jQuery.

Should be able to handle complete app development lifecycle independently.

Knowledge of Push Notification Service and Firebase will be an added advantage.

Required Skills Experience :

Hands-on experience in React Native APIs, ReactJS, Javascript, ECMAScript (OOJS) and JSX,Maps.

At least 2 years of Mobile App Development experience in Ionic Framework (Version 3 / Latest Version)

Built advanced applications in Ionic Framework

Strong knowledge of application design patterns

Worked on Social API integration, Core location APIs, Payment gateway integration, Google Maps, Geo-Location, Map Web Views, Push Notification Service

Must have strong experience in JavaScript, Cordova, Angular JS / Node JS/

Strong Knowledge of SQLite, MySQL, Firebase or similar databases

Experience on UI technologies including HTML5, CSS, CSS3, JavaScript

Able to Optimize for multi-device iPhone, iPad, Tablet Smartphones

Published 1 or more apps in Google Play Store and Apple iTunes store will be an added advantage

Knowledge of Chat Application Development will be an added advantage

Experience of developing native Android or iOS applications will be an added advantage

Qualification :

B.Tech, M.Tech, B.Sc IT, MCA

title: Mobile Application Developer
jobDescription:
• Designing developing advanced applicationson Android
  • Work in collaboration with cross-functional teams of NodeJS, C++ Embedded C
  • Perform unit testing of code to ensurereliability robustness of the app
  • Follow implemented best android practicesfor efficient performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
  • Work towards continuous improvement innovation by exploring, evaluating, and implementing new technologies tomaximize development efficiency

Essential Skills: -

  • Strong knowledge in OO design, Design Pattern and programming skills
  • Proven working experience in Android SDK, Flutter SDK, Kotlin and have published at least one original Android app
  • Good understanding of full application life cycle
  • Well versed with Android Build systems and make files, GDB Debugger tool and so on
  • Familiarity with web services (SOAP / REST / JSON / XML)
  • Familiarity with Location Google Map APIs, cloud message APIs and push notifications
  • Strong knowledge of Android UI design Principles (Material Design), patterns best practices.
  • Excellent debugging skills
  • Experience with Bluetooth Classic 4.0+ is a plus
  • Knowledge of Agile, GitHub and Scrum Processes is required

Preferred Skills: -

  • Expertise in Java Scripting, NodeJS and API development is preferred
  • Experience with Database is a plus
  • Familiarity of sensors is an add on for integrating IoT projects
